## HCGSN256

The Cartesian coordinates of 256-channel HydroCel Geodesic Sensor Net average template montage. 

The data are structured as a list with following components:
- sensor ... sensor labels (according to EGI GSN Technical Manual)
- D2 ... projection of sensor positions in 2D space
- D3 ... coordinates of sensor positions in 3D 
- ROI ... division of sensors into several areas according to brain anatomy (frontal, central, occipital, parietal, temporal)
